releaseNotes:
Initial PRO release with advanced features:
- Configurable Risk:Reward ratios (1:1, 1:2, 1:3, 2:1, 3:1, custom)
- Drag direction determines which level you're setting (SL or TP)
- Hotkeys: Toggle tool (Ctrl+Shift+B), Cycle R:R (Ctrl+Shift+R)
- Real-time visual overlay showing R:R, SL, TP during drag
- Multiple bracket sets for position scaling
- Sound alerts for successful placement and errors
- Comprehensive settings window
- Debug logging to file

changes: Added configurable R:R ratios with presets and custom values
Implemented drag direction logic (down for SL, up for TP)
Added hotkey support for toggle and R:R cycling
Created real-time drag overlay with price calculations
Added multiple bracket sets for position scaling
Built comprehensive settings window with tabs
Added debug logging to custom log file
